overview: When the Holmes Woolen Mill burns down, political activist Leopold Dilg is jailed for arson and accidental murder. Escaping, Leopold hides out in the home of his childhood sweetheart Nora Shelley... which she has just rented to unsuspecting law professor Michael Lightcap.
tagline: Screen comedy so gay... drama so thrilling... love so exciting, it will be the talk of YOUR town!
cast: Cary Grant|Jean Arthur|Ronald Colman|Edgar Buchanan|Glenda Farrell
